name: Commander Collins Chicken Place
description:
Howdy folks! Welcome to Commander Collins Chicken Place!

The Food Wars have been going on for two years.  In that time the Freed States of America have made their mark on the United States economy.  Supply chains are down, a new depression is around the corner and general reception of the war is at an all time low.  But there's one factor that's keeping us from wining.  Commander Collins Chicken Place.  The most respectable fast food establishment in the country.  

Here at the CCCP we serve only the finest, the tastiest and the bestest chicken around!

We don't know how the CCCP is still operating.  Most of their farms and production plants are under our control.  The only remaining ones are not producing enough.  At least, they shouldn't be.  And there's some particular interest of a massive amounts of shipment at one particular store.  

We suspect that it's being fronted by Dan Gurgen, one of the CCCPs best mercenaries.  He has a history of mistreating POWs and civilians, and is in charge of the shipment of product.  We need to find out what he's doing at this store...
